topic: A close-up video captures an adorable white and ginger cat in a playful struggle with a human hand. The persistent feline, with its wide, innocent eyes and determined expression, repeatedly attempts to snatch a golden-brown, fried food item, resembling a chicken nugget, which is held by a gloved hand. The cat bites and pulls at the food, letting out a series of high-pitched meows as the hand playfully resists. The background features a patterned sheet with cute cartoon characters and ornate golden curtains. Towards the end of the video, the same cat is humorously shown wearing a black head covering and a cardboard sign around its neck, which reads in English: 'I will never secretly eat my owner's chicken nuggets again.'
video_sound: high-pitched meows of the cat, subtle background music
video_background: patterned sheet with cute cartoon characters and ornate golden curtains
video_foreground: adorable white and ginger cat with a human gloved hand holding a chicken nugget
video_actions: cat biting and pulling at the food, hand playfully resisting, cat wearing a black head covering and a cardboard sign at the end
video_props: chicken nugget, gloved hand, patterned sheet, golden curtains, black head covering, cardboard sign with text in English
video_safety: no real human faces, safe for all audiences

veo_params.negative_prompt: cartoon, drawing, low quality, overexposure, blurry
